DOC: article-15679.txt.xml story | 0 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 | The U.S. Federal Trade Commission has reached out to Google Inc and Twitter in an investigation into Facebook Inc 's $ 1 billion acquisition of photo-sharing service Instagram , a source familiar with the probe told Reuters . the U.S. Federal Trade Commission have reach out to Google Inc and Twitter in a investigation into Facebook Inc 's $ 1 billion acquisition of photo-sharing service Instagram , a source familiar with the probe tell Reuters .
